entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Decompiler needs to be updated to decompile .NET 10 assemblies #78161
  • API for generating the virtual project behind file-based programs #78159
  • Ignored directives report errors in disabled regions #78157
  • Suggestion for simplifying field access in non-partial properties #78156
  • BuildHost does not update properly in incremental builds #78153
  • CS8618 suggests using `required` on static properties #78152

Closed

  • Debugging code generated by IIncrementalGenerator fails due to missing output files #78143
  • Collection expressions: adjust the plural in CS1503 #70183
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure FindSourceDefinitionAsync works in frozen compilation cases #78164
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Emit CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute for instance operators #78163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from codelens layer (#78045)" #78162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Local-Symbol Containing-Symbol in New-Extension-Method-Rewriter for Capture Analysis #78160
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Avoid ignored directive errors in disabled regions #78158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Move DiagnosticService impl down to Features layer #78155
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Allow `readonly` modifier for instance operators #78151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Implement CRef binding for compound assignment operators #78111
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Use ReadOnlySpans #78141
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue #70183: adjust the plural for expression collection #78110
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Make Razor redirect code more robust #78039
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle textDocument/didChange notifications that don't pass across the range #78165
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow Razor cohosting to run in VS Code, and fix it in VS #78167
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Track stale projects #78166
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • CSharp Completion Context - Add method caller context #78032
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix razor analyzer loading #78116
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cache MEF catalog in servicehub process #78122
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: nullability analysis for invocations and method groups #78080
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add VirtualProjectGenerator API #78145
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Initial stubs for doing analysis of copilot changes to help us drive post-change cleanup work. #78146
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not parse URIs during LSP serialization/deserialization #76691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
